before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"2o9ji","text":"Evaluate if this is required for processing with your platform/technology. Not all require a certain DV200 to move forward with processing. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9c1pi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dqivg","text":"If tissue sample is scarce or rare, consider the best step -- Use some of the sample for RNA quality evaluation or move forward without it, understanding the risks and/or benefits of doing so. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"eob4v","text":"Completed prior to going through -omics and spatial technologies to evaluate FFPE blocks for their RNA quality. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8k4mn","text":"Create or request curls from the FFPE blocks (typically done by histologist). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cusin","text":"Follow recommendations as noted below. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"amtdn","text":"Keep curls in a 1.5mL tube at -80ÂºC until RNA isolation process. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
